description:
This light and durable Garmin mount secures to your handlebar for easy access to your ride data. Ideal for larger sized Garmins including the Edge 1000 and Explore series. The mount elevates your computer slightly away from the bars, freeing up valuable cockpit real estate.

  • Made of light, durable CNC machined aluminum
  • Handlebar mount is compatible with 31.8mm handlebars
  • Underside is pre-drilled to accept the separately available combo mount, which accommodates GoPro style mounts
  • Replaceable co-polymer insert locks computers in place
name: K-Edge Garmin Max XL Mount
